summary: Add sanitized Magento SCD DB snapshot export runbook for CI builds

changes.description: Adds a support runbook for CI build-time static-content deployment that exports a minimal Magento database snapshot (store/theme/config tables) from the environment's PHP service. core_config_data rows are preserved while sensitive values are redacted by path and encrypted-value patterns, and the payload is returned as a compressed snapshot for mz-control/build consumption.
